name: readme
description: Does the project have a README.md file?

name: license
description: Does the project have a LICENSE file?

name: citation
description: Does the project cite any references in 'manuscript.Rmd' or 'preregistration.Rmd'?

name: comprehensive
description: Does the project cite all literature, data sources, materials, and methods (including R-packages) used?

name: data
description: Does the project have a public* 'data.csv' or 'synthetic_data.csv' file? (*public: version controlled in 'Git')

name: data_checksums
description: Are the data checksums up to date?

name: code
description: Does the project contain any '.R' code files?

name: code_reproducible
description: Can the entire project be reproduced by running a single file (e.g.,'manuscript.Rmd', 'run_me.R', or a Makefile)?

name: materials
description: Any new materials are shared openly; existing materials are referenced.

name: design
description: Details of the study design are documented.

name: analysis
description: Details of the analysis are documented.

name: preregistration
description: Does the project have a preregistration?

name: prereg_analysis
description: Does the preregistration contain detailed analysis plans or preliminary code?

name: git_repo
description: Does the project have a 'Git' repository?

name: has_remote
description: Is the 'Git' repository connected to a remote repository (e.g., 'GitHub')?
